thread.section_title: Hotel Vernet - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The best Ive been !!!!
thread.title_full: The best Ive been !!!! - Review of Hotel Vernet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kathy M
title: The best Ive been !!!!
text:
The best hotel I have been to.
Near the Arc of Triumph, in the heart of Paris.
The room was amazing with a beautiful view from the balcony.
But the best of the best was the breakfast service. Not only they offer a wide variety of food and drinks , the quality is first class.
If you go yo Paris and can afford it dont think more, go to Vernet.
